ese karanna wu thanaththa hata anyayan ha mithrathwaya pawathwa gatha haki wanne ya.melowa prashansawa ha maranin pasuswarga sampaththiya labana thanaththa(11 - 12 - 13 - 14) dharmayen gihi geyi wesena panditha wu yamek mawupiyange wada karanne we da, hama kalhi ma ambaudaruwanta hithawath we da, ambaudaruwo ya, thama nisa jiwath wana kamkaruwo ya yana dekotasage ma yahapatha pinisa owun ge oona epa kam salakanne we da, silwath we da, sudusu paridi sangraha kirimen jiwath wana nayanta da pinpeth dimen paralo sapath nayanta da, prathyaya pirinamimen shramana brahmanayanta da, pinpeth dim aadiyen dewiyanta da, sathuta athi karanne we da, hetheme ese yahapatha kota pujya wanne ya.
